attributes.action: Let Canterbury academy boys where shorts
attributes.additional_details: As the school expects us to where trousers in 30 degree weather as some of them had started to where skirts
attributes.background: Make Canterbury academy boys where short

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about school uniforms at individual schools are a matter for the governing bodies for each school, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Require schools to make uniform optional: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259

Prevent enforcement of school uniforms if temperatures exceed a certain level: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612028
